sys_embedded_help_content.content:
This is the main form where you configure the automated generation of list codes from your customer instance into a HTML formatted information body before being exported into a MS Word document.

 

HELP Article: KPMGAUDEMO2 - KB0010230

 

TO DO - Future enhancements:

1. How this can accomodate sections that have more than 2 columns of Name and Description. Candidates: Dictionary, Application Module (navigator) and ATF.

2. Better formatting in MS Word

3. Add Customer Logo on the MS Word

4. Nice UI to bring all the forms together in one seamless process on Service Portal

5. Parent - Child of the "Query run" table so you can do a run per application. E.g. you can have a dedicated list of codes for Incident Management then one for Problem then for Change, etc. One "Query run" record for each application and one to act as a parent in which the HTML and MS Word generation will tie in all the child "Query run" records nicely.
